hero.title: Gian Michel
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Experienced full-stack developer specializing in building scalable web applications with modern technologies. Passionate about creating elegant solutions to complex problems.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a full-stack developer with over 4 years of professional experience building web applications. I specialize in React, Next.js, Node.js, and Java Spring Boot. I'm passionate about creating user-friendly interfaces and robust backend systems.

position1.title: Full Stack Developer
position1.description: Led full-stack development initiatives across the entire software development lifecycle, including code implementation, deployment automation, and CI/CD pipeline management using GitHub Actions. Architected and maintained scalable backend services with Java Spring Boot while developing responsive front-end applications using Next.js and React.js.

position2.title: Full Stack Developer
position2.description: Led architecture and backend development for a greenfield product using Nest.js, delivering a scalable and high-performance system from the ground up. Contributed to front-end development with React and Redux, optimizing state management patterns. Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an agile environment to deliver features iteratively.

project1.name: Terceiro Setor
project1.tech: Next.js, Prime React, Java Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, Docker
project1.highlights: Led migration from legacy Laravel 7 to modern stack, reducing task completion time by 60%, improved system response times by 40%, implemented automated CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time from hours to less than 15 minutes

project2.name: Conservatório
project2.tech: React.js, Prime React, Java Spring Boot
project2.highlights: Developed comprehensive management features, reduced manual data entry time by 50%, created lesson planning system improving course preparation by 30%, decreased record processing time by 45%

project3.name: MUP
project3.tech: Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Java Spring Boot
project3.highlights: Designed multimedia file system supporting images, documents, videos and audio, managing 10,000+ digital assets, improved content discovery by 70%

project4.name: Teigro
project4.description: Agricultural Traceability and Cold Chain Monitoring Platform
project4.highlights: Architected complete backend infrastructure for agricultural traceability platform, optimized RESTful APIs reducing average response times by 45%, implemented rate limiting and authentication layers maintaining 99.8% system availability

education.title: Education
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Systems
education.university: UNIPAM - Centro Universitário de Patos de Minas
education.description: The Information Systems course develops skills related to planning, organization and development of information systems for companies. As a professional, I am capable of identifying organizational problems and defining the most optimized computational solutions using modern information technologies available in the market.

contact.description: I'd love to hear from you! Feel free to reach out with any questions or opportunities.
